Public Health Review Cover

This cover won a competition for the student-led public health journal, the Public Health Review. It aims to convey the experience of masking during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Graphic Design Project

Background

Resilience Continuum is a project by Claire Nyquist which explores science through data visualization, fiction, and graphic design.
